name: Harold "The Reliable" Thompson
description: Harold is a practical, no-nonsense fighter with a muscular build, short brown hair, and steady brown eyes. He wears functional clothing and is often seen in his well-worn chainmail and helmet when preparing for battle.
backstory: Harold Thompson was born in a small village and spent his childhood as a farmer. He joined the army seeking adventure and became known for his steadfastness. After retiring from active duty, he now works as a mercenary, taking on jobs that involve protecting caravans and training local militias.
personality: Harold is serious and disciplined, valuing order and routine. He is reliable and trustworthy, with a dry sense of humor. Not seeking glory, he focuses on doing his duty and helping others.
